## Checklist
<!-- If this checklist is deleted from the PR submission it will be immediately closed -->
- [ ] I understand the code I am submitting.
- [ ] I have added unit tests that prove my fix/feature works
- [ ] I have run this code locally and verified it fixes the issue.
- [ ] New and existing tests pass locally
- [ ] Documentation was updated where necessary
- [ ] I have read and followed the [contribution guidelines](https://github.com/mozilla-ai/any-llm/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] **AI Usage:**
    - [ ] No AI was used.
    - [ ] AI was used for drafting/refactoring.
    - [ ] This is fully AI-generated.
